subject: [perl #42373] [TODO] handle non-integer file descriptors
body:
# New Ticket Created by  Paul Cochrane 
# Please include the string:  [perl #42373]
# in the subject line of all future correspondence about this issue. 
# 


In file src/ops/io.ops, there is the todo item:

"integral file descriptors might not exist outside of the UNIX
     platform.  This op needs work."
